rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0001
rows.name:
The king always believed in the Driver
of the Holy Grail, and in Your Highness.

rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0002
rows.name:
Believed that you would bring the
Holy Grail back no matter the cost.

rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0003
rows.name:
I see that his belief was well-placed.
But more than anything, I am glad to
see you safe.
